document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2021-08
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA MODIFYING TITLE 8 {HEALTH AND SAFETY) OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TO ADD CHAPTER 8.20 MANDATORY MUNICIPAL SOLID WASTE, RECYCLING AND COMPOST MATERIAL DISPOSAL REDUCTION
